quest.name: Or Ever the Silver Cord Be Loosed
journal: Serendipity requires your assistance with a dire matter.
The guildmaster needs your help to aid an ailing Gigi. Craft an ingot of high-quality silver and deliver it to Serendipity posthaste.

Serendipity explains that, while she can easily repair and replace most mammet components, the cores that contain a mammet's personality and memory are a completely different matter. Thankfully, the failing part is one she can reproduce, so the stalwart assistant should soon be back to normal.

※The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity upon reaching level 30.
objectives: Deliver a silver ingot to Serendipity.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Oh, Forename! I was just hoping that you would come by. You see, something's happened to Gigi...

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Recently, he started acting strangely─aye, even by his usual standards.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Anyway, I believe I've determined the cause. It's quite complicated, but to put it simply...he's breaking down.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I can handle the repairs, but I need to count on you for something.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I need you to make an ingot of silver─not any ingot of silver, mind you, but a high-quality one.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: It may seem daunting, but I have every confidence that you can handle the task!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The higher the quality achieved during synthesis, the greater the chance that the finished item will be of a higher grade (HQ).

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Please bring me the silver as soon as it's ready.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: This is perfect, Forename!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I can fix Gigi with this, I'm sure of it!

dialogue.name: GIGI
dialogue.text:
NE※GIGIGI★※...
SiLvEr...InGoT...gAaAh... FoRcEd To AcCePt AiD fRoM gReEnHoRn... So HuMiLiAtInG.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Poor, poor Gigi. He's like a completely different person.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: ...What? Not that different than usual, you say?

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Well, it may seem that way to you, but I can assure you he's quite out of sorts. Anyway...silver was historically prized for its beauty. Ancient peoples even believed it to possess magical properties.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Although they did not completely understand the natural processes involved, they were in fact correct. It's difficult to explain to someone without an extensive background in the relevant fields, but let's just say that silver is really, really good at channeling aether.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: For this reason, silver is the material of choice for making a mammet's precision parts. Thankfully, the component responsible for Gigi's erratic behavior is within my ability to craft.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: But gods forbid that his core should ever be damaged.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: ...Oh, the core? It's like, well...it's everything that makes Gigi himself. His memories, his personality─his soul, really.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: When he was first built over a century ago, he knew nothing. But, by assisting guildmaster after guildmaster, he's come to possess more wisdom and experience than any living goldsmith.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: That knowledge...and the gentle soul that carries it, are our guild's greatest treasures.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Heh, I take it you didn't realize just how irreplaceable he is. Believe me, it's been a great comfort having him around.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: And thanks to you, we can continue to rely on his counsel!
